title: Calories in Nonfat Milk
meta_description: Discover calories in nonfat milk per cup, including protein, carbs, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
assumptions: Skim/nonfat cow's milk, pasteurized, per 1 cup (244 g or ~240 ml), no added flavors or sweeteners.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fortification, processing, and serving size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One cup of nonfat milk contains about 83 kcal and 8 g protein.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts labels for comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one cup of nonfat milk?
What's the protein in nonfat milk?
Does nonfat milk have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Only 0.2 g total fat and 5 mg cholesterol per cup.

faqs.q: How do calories compare to whole milk?
faqs.a: Nonfat has 83 kcal per cup; whole milk has about 150 kcal.

faqs.q: Is nonfat milk low in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, 12.2 g carbs per cup, mostly from natural lactose.
